participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and patient, Emily has a warm demeanor and is dedicated to her students.
participant_1.background: i work as a school teacher. i've a dogs. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i am a woman. i attend church every week.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and fashion-conscious, Jordan has a keen eye for luxury and a desire to prove himself.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices.
